  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3272</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Lottery- In literature teachingt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lotterie im Literatur teachingt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La loterie dans le teachingt de littérature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O lottery- no teachingt da literatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il lottery- nel teachingt della letteratura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λαχειοφόρος αγορά - στη λογοτεχνία teachingt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La lotería en teachingt de la literatura</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This web page includes a collection of ideas , suggestions and learning activities and worksheets prepared/collated by various teachers on how to utilize The Lottery for Matriculation English classes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">short story</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cloze test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Webseite schließt eine Ansammlung Ideen, 
Vorschläge und Lernenaktivitäten und Bogen prepared/collated durch 
verschiedene Lehrer auf ein, wie man die Lotterie für Matriculation 
englische Kategorien verwendet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette page Web inclut une collection d'idées, 
suggestions et étude et tableaux prepared/collated par de divers 
professeurs sur la façon dont utiliser la loterie pour les classes 
anglaises d'Immatriculation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web page inclui uma coleção das idéias, 
as sugestões e as atividades de aprendizagem e as folhas 
prepared/collated por vários professores em como utilizar o lottery 
para classes inglesas de Matriculation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web page include una collezione di idee, 
suggerimenti ed attività imparanti e fogli di lavoro 
prepared/collated dai vari insegnanti su come utilizzare il lottery 
per i codici categoria inglesi di Matriculation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ιστοσελίδας περιλαμβάνει μια συλλογή των 
ιδεών, των προτάσεων και των δραστηριοτήτων και των φύλλων 
εργασίας εκμάθησης που προετοιμάζονται/που διαταξινομούνται από 
τους διάφορους δασκάλους στο πώς να χρησιμοποιήσει τη λαχειοφόρο 
αγορά για τις αγγλικές κλάσεις εγγραφής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web page incluye una colección de las 
ideas, las sugerencias y las actividades que aprenden y las hojas de 
trabajo prepared/collated de los varios profesores en cómo utilizar 
la lotería para las clases inglesas de Matriculation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
